description: Number of partitions of n into parts 3k or 3k+1.
formula: a(n) ~ Gamma(1/3) * exp(2*Pi*sqrt(n)/3) / (4 * sqrt(3) * Pi^(2/3) * n^(11/12)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 23 2015
mathematica: nmax = 50; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(3*k))*(1 - x^(3*k-2))), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 23 2015 *)
